mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO seckill(product_id, product_name, quantity, start_time, end_time, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{productId}, #{productName}, #{quantity}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, product_id, product_name, quantity, start_time, end_time, gmt_create, gmt_modified FROM seckill ORDER BY gmt_create DESC limit #{offset}, #{limit}
